sentence.Network_en: At the moment there's no hard and fast timetable.
sentence.Network_cn: 目前还没有明确的时间表。

sentence.Network_en: Our factory has a hard and fast rule against smoking.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们工厂严格规定不许吸烟.

sentence.Network_en: No hard and fast line can be drawn between the two.
